rooms.description: Spacious living area with abundant natural light and ventilation. Designed to be the focal point of the apartment.
A functional dining space adjacent to the living area for shared family meals.
Modern eco-friendly kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and natural ventilation.
Guest bedroom that can also serve as a home office or study area if needed.

openings.description: Main entrance aligned according to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Window positioned on the east wall providing morning light and promoting auspiciousness.
South-facing window that allows natural ventilation in the dining area.
Door to the central courtyard designed for relaxation and family gatherings.

special_areas.description: Central open space that adheres to Vastu norms by being centrally located to promote harmony and balance.
Shared utility area for storage and minor household activities.

notes: The design integrates Vastu principles by ensuring the courtyard is centrally located to enhance energy flow.
The split-level concept is realized on the ground floor with open transitions between living spaces, creating a seamless connection between indoor and outdoor environments.
Eco-friendly elements include natural ventilation, solar-friendly window placements, and sustainable materials in construction.
